description: This file defines an Android activity class 'RecipeDetailActivity' responsible for displaying the details of a recipe, managing user interactions such as favoriting and sharing recipes, and handling UI updates and data fetching from repository and preferences store.

classes.name: RecipeDetailActivity
classes.description: An Android activity class that displays detailed information about a recipe, including image, title, ingredients, instructions, and manages user interactions such as toggling favorites and sharing the recipe.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, loads recipe data asynchronously, updates UI elements, and sets click listeners for favorites and sharing actions.

methods.name: updateFavButton
methods.description: Updates the favorite button text based on whether the recipe is marked as favorite or not.
